summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 MCKENZIE STARWOOD WITH GREEN BALL TOW MASTER TIRES, SIZE 205/75/15. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, THE FRONT PASSENGER SIDE TIRE BLEW OUT CAUSING DAMAGE TO THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT REPLACED THE TIRE WITH THE SPARE TIRE. AFTER INSPECTING THE TIRES, THE CONTACT NOTICED TREAD SEPARATION ON ALL THE TIRES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL TIRE SHOP FOR THE REPLACEMENT OF THE TIRES. THE MANUFACTURER OF THE TIRES WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE TIRES WERE REPLACED. THE DOT NUMBER WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3000. *TR
